snippet.title: Half-Life 2 Beta Minimalist Mod Official Trailer
snippet.description:
First, let us consider the fact that for the first time ever, as a species, an entirely playable and full version of the Half-Life 2 Beta campaign is in our reach. Half-Life 2 Beta Minimalist mod is a COMPLETE RECREATION of Half-Life 2's original storyline, that follows HL2 Early Geography and 1999-2001 storyline for an accurate and fulfilling experience, while retaining a modest and minimalist design.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aF10I72tsio
